I'm a very ordinary human being; I just happen to like reading books.
Haruki Murakami

Deafblind neurospicy queer kitchen witch living in the swamp with 2 service dogs, and an over abundance of loose leaf tea, books, and barbecue implements. Dog Foster Mom, clicker trainer, believer in the power of positive canine communication. Passions include cooking, aromatherapy, reading, and setting shit on fire. Requires caffeine and solitude in equal amounts to maintain grip on reality.

I build open-source software and make little gadgets.

From a time when email was cool. Hard to distinguish from a good programmer.
